comments.body:
This file was included to fix broken exception references throughout the docs (e.g., `MlflowException`, `ExecutionException`). For Sphinx to render these references properly, the target exceptions must exist somewhere in the documentation. This new page documents relevant MLflow exceptions and inserts them under the `exceptions` directory, which is *not* included in the Table of Contents / Documentation index. This decision was made because modules in the index contain user-facing APIs that provide platform functionality, while `mlflow.exceptions` only defines exceptions surfaced by other API calls. 

These exceptions are still reachable via hyperlink from the docstrings of relevant MLflow APIs that throw them.
Explicitly override the docstring of `MlflowException` since the current description is targeted at developers constructing the exception rather than callers catching it

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +6,10 @@.. exception:: mlflow.exceptions.MlflowException(message, error_code=1, **kwargs)

    Generic exception thrown when an MLflow operation fails

.. automodule:: mlflow.exceptions
